controller

Class MenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MenuController

  • public class MenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls every events on the menu window.
    Author:
    quentin sauvage
    See Also:
    MenuView, Menu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuController(Menu menu)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void controlBindings(java.lang.String bind, int bindCode)
      Asks the menu to change the binding.
      void controlCreateGame(java.lang.String gameName, java.lang.String mapName)
      Asks the menu to inform the server with the information of the game the user wants to create.
      void controlGamesList(java.lang.String host)
      Asks the games list to the server, and add this list in the menu.
      void controlJoinGame(java.lang.String game)
      Asks the menu to inform the server which game the user wants to join, then asks the GameHandler to display the game window.
      void controlServersList()
      Asks the menu to search for servers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuController

        public MenuController(Menu menu)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        menu - the menu handling the menu window logic.

    • Method Detail

      • controlGamesList

        public void controlGamesList(java.lang.String host)
        Asks the games list to the server, and add this list in the menu.
        Parameters:
        host - the host we want to get the games list.

      • controlServersList

        public void controlServersList()
        Asks the menu to search for servers.

      • controlJoinGame

        public void controlJoinGame(java.lang.String game)
        Asks the menu to inform the server which game the user wants to join, then asks the GameHandler to display the game window. The user will automatically join the game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game the user wants to join.
        See Also:
        GameHandler

      • controlCreateGame

        public void controlCreateGame(java.lang.String gameName,
                              java.lang.String mapName)
        Asks the menu to inform the server with the information of the game the user wants to create.
        Parameters:
        gameName - the name of the game the user wants to create.
        mapName - the name of the map the user wants to create.

      • controlBindings

        public void controlBindings(java.lang.String bind,
                            int bindCode)
        Asks the menu to change the binding.
        Parameters:
        bind - the name of key changed.
        bindCode - the code of the key changed.
